name: Mouvement par Caissier
query:
select o.date as Date, 
o.name as 'N ° Pièce', 
o.designation as 'Désignation',
case when n.type_operation = 'Encaissement' THEN o.montant ELSE 0 END as 'Recettes',
case when n.type_operation = 'Décaissement' THEN o.montant ELSE 0 END as 'Dépenses', 
o.devise as 'Devise'
from (
    SELECT *
    FROM tabEncaissement
    UNION
    SELECT *
    FROM tabDecaissement
    ) o 
INNER JOIN `tabDetails Operation de Caisse` d on o.name = d.parent
INNER JOIN `tabNature Operations` n on d.nature_operations = n.name
where o.date >= %(date_debut)s and o.date <= %(date_fin)s and o.owner = %(caissier)s
